entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
